attributes.action: Fund restoration of the Cutty Sark
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After the struggle for funds to maintain the Cutty Sark, currently undergoing a £25m restoration, and the terrible fire which has just destroyed so much of it, could the government please grant money or authorise a lottery grant to help rebuild this beautiful ship, part of our national heritage.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
